subject: internalArrayEquals is private
msgSnippet: Hi I wanted to compare to float arrays and assert they are not equal, however, junit is a bit of a pain in this direction as 1. assertArrayEquals doesn t
messageBody:
Hi I wanted to compare to float arrays and assert they are not equal,
however, junit is a bit of a pain in this direction as

1. assertArrayEquals doesn't include a
assertArrayEquals(float[],float[]) version
2. internalArrayEquals(String message, Object expecteds,
Object actuals) is private so requiring a copy and paste

so a suggestion couldn't we have

public static void internalArrayEquals... and even better a version with

public static boolean internalArrayEquals...

just a thought


regards
gary
